message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something truly valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate you coming down to $120, but I'm really looking to spend closer to $100. Would you be willing to consider that?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend closer to $100, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value this product brings.
